thread.title: Jacinto Esteban Joins the BRIANNAS Fine Salad Dressing Team

author: cnbc.com
title: Jacinto Esteban Joins the BRIANNAS Fine Salad Dressing Team

locations.name: briannas fine salad dressing team brenham

text:
BRENHAM, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Del Sol Food Company, Inc., manufacturer of BRIANNAS® Fine Salad Dressings, has hired Jacinto Esteban as Sales Manager to support their corporate sales team. Jacinto will be assisting Jeffrey Sadler, Vice President of Sales and Marketing, with domestic and international business.
Jacinto's extensive experience in the food business began in 1996 as a global trade coordinator for ED&F Man Sugar in New York City. Since then he has contributed to the growth of La Sabroza brands in the global market, and more recently the USA sales for the Sabormex Group of brands which include Clemente Jacques food items, La Sierra brand bean products, as well as Café Legal and Café Oro coffees.
Jeffrey Sadler said, “We are excited to welcome Jacinto Esteban to the BRIANNAS family. Jacinto’s impressive knowledge of the food industry and his passion for BRIANNAS make him a valuable addition to our sales team. In his new position, Jacinto will manage BRIANNAS online, export and multicultural accounts within the US. We view his appointment as a sign of BRIANNAS’ commitment to being a leading company in the salad dressing category.”
BRIANNAS’ line of 15 delicious gourmet dressings continues to grow in popularity among consumers who value food products made in small batches with premium ingredients. Thirteen BRIANNAS dressings are gluten free and none of the dressings contain high fructose corn syrup or trans fats. Ten BRIANNAS dressings are certified Kosher.
About BRIANNAS® Fine Salad Dressing
BRIANNAS delectable dressings have won numerous first place awards for their spectacular taste, and have been featured in Real Simple, Southern Living, Food & Wine, Women’s Health and on NBC’s “The Today Show.” For more information, please visit Briannas.com , or check out BRIANNAS on Facebook, Pinterest, and Instagram (@BRIANNAS_Salad).
